test_endpoint.title: Heart Rate Monitor - Pulse App
test_endpoint.summary:
Heart Rate Monitor, the most accurate app to measure your heart rate and pulse. Just put your fingertip on camera to get your heartbeat within a few seconds. No medical heart rate monitors required! Get Heart Rate Monitor now to embrace a healthy heart!

❤ Just use your phone - no dedicated device needed!
❤ In-depth analysis with waveform graphs
❤ CSV export available to print
❤ Health knowledge and insights by experts
❤ Protect your privacy safely: Locally / Google Cloud / Google Fit

★ How to use it?
Gently cover the back camera lens with one fingertip and stay still, you will get your heart rate after several seconds. For accurate measurement, stay in a bright place or turn on the flashlight.

★ Is it accurate?
Our App uses the camera of your phone to capture the image and uses algorithms to recognize the heartbeat. The accuracy is ensured by comprehensive and professional experiments.

★ How often to use it?
For accurate measurement, use it several times a day especially when you wake up in the morning, go to bed and finish workouts.

★ What is a normal heart rate?
According to American Heart Association and the Mayo Clinic, a normal resting heartbeat for adults ranges from 60 to 100 bpm. But it can be affected by many factors such as stress, fitness level, medication use, etc.

DISCLAIMER
· Heart Rate Monitor - Pulse App should not be used as a medical device in the diagnosis of heart diseases.
· Heart Rate Monitor - Pulse App is not intended for a medical emergency. Consult your primary care physician if you need any help.
· In some devices, Heart Rate Monitor - Pulse App may make the LED flash very hot.

Monitor and analyze your heart rate with Heart Rate Monitor - Pulse App for a better understanding of your body. Check heart rate regularly to protect yourself and your family.

test_endpoint.title: PDF Reader - PDF Viewer
test_endpoint.summary:
The most practical PDF Reader for Android!
Easily read, edit, and manage all your PDF files with this free PDF Reader & Viewer - A+ Read.
Doodle, add notes, bookmark, merge, split, etc., all supported.

Looking for a document viewer and editor to support your work and study?
Why not try this simple and effective PDF Reader & Viewer - A+ Read?

This professional documents reading app can auto search and display all your PDF files, allowing you to fast open and read PDFs on your device. More than a PDF viewer, it’s also a PDF editor and PDF manager, you can take notes, merge & split PDF files, set passwords to protect files, add bookmarks, etc. It’s also very convenient to share PDF documents with others.

With all the features you need, PDF Reader & Viewer - A+ Read brings you the perfect experience of reading PDF documents.
Try it for free now! 🎉🎉

📖 Convenient PDF Viewer
- Auto search and display all your PDF files
- Quickly open and read PDFs
- A simple and clear list of PDF files
- Easily search and get PDFs
- Add bookmarks to PDF pages for future reference

📔 Smart PDF Reader
- Page by page and continuous scrolling mode
- Horizontal and vertical viewing mode
- Full screen mode for the best reading experience
- Zoom in and out of the pages as needed
- Go to page directly by entering the page number

📝 Efficient PDF Editor
- Annotate on PDF files
- Mark phrases with highlight color, underline, and strikethrough
- Doodle on your PDFs
- Easily search and copy any text in PDF files

📂 Full-featured PDF Manager
- Merge & split your PDF files
- Set password to protect your documents
- Recently opened files in a simple list for quick viewing
- Share your PDF files via any social media easily
- The most lightweight PDF Reader/Manager, only 12MB
- Rename your PDF files to your liking
- Printing PDF files from your device

🌟 More features on the way
► Dark mode
► Compress PDF documents
► Fill PDF forms
► Add e-signatures
► Add/delete pages of PDF files
► Smart PDF scanner
► Convert between PDF and Word, Excel, JPG, PNG, etc.
...

Enjoy your reading with this superior PDF Reader for Android!✌️

Your feedback and suggestions are always welcome! Please feel free to contact us at pdfreaderappfeedback@gmail.com if you have any questions.

test_endpoint.title: Document Reader: PDF, DOC, XLS
test_endpoint.summary:
Document Reader is an all-in-one file viewer that helps you read and manage all formats of office files easily. PDF, WORD, EXCEL, PPT, TXT, etc. all supported.

It's very easy to use, and compatible with all office formats. Just open it, you'll see all your documents well organized in folders for quick search and view. Open Word, read PDF, manage all files in one place easily!

Why choose Document Reader?
👏 Support all formats - PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLXS, PPT, TXT, PNG, JPG, RTF, etc.
👏 All document viewer/office viewer
👏 Read all documents anywhere, anytime with just one click
👏 Simple and clear file lists, easy to search and manage files
👏 Bookmark documents for quick access
👏 No internet required, read documents offline

Download this simple, fast, lightweight all document reader now, and you'll get a PDF reader, Word/Excel viewer, PPT viewer, all in one!

Document Reader can work as:

📕 PDF Reader/PDF Viewer
- Zoom in/zoom out pages while reading
- Jump to the page you want directly
- Switch from landscape and portrait reading mode freely
- Easily print and share PDFs

📘 Word Reader
- Handy document viewer for all DOC, DOCX, and DOCS files
- Easily find your target file through quick search feature
- Sort all documents by file path, size, name, last edit date, etc.
- Simple and elegant interface

📈 Excel/Text Viewer
- Quickly open XLS, XLSX, TXT files and search out the data you want
- A simple and straightforward way to read spreadsheets on your device

🔍 PPT Viewer
- Viewing PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX files has never been easier
- Fast and stable performance, HD quality

➡️ More features on the way…
✔️ Image to PDF converter
✔️ Edit documents freely
✔️ Support more document formats, RAR, ZIP, MOBI, HTML, etc.
✔️ Night mode
✔️ Search text within documents
…

Try Document Reader now and you can read, edit and manage documents in all formats on the go!

Thank you for choosing Document Reader. 💗 We welcome all feedback and suggestions. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us at allreaderappfeedback@gmail.com.

test_endpoint.title: QR Code Scanner & Scanner App
test_endpoint.summary:
Free and full-featured QR code scanner app for all Android devices, helps you easily scan and decode all types of QR codes/barcodes at lightning speed⚡. 100% free and easy to use.

*Easy-to-Use Scanner App*
QR code reader just uses your phone's camera to scan and read QR codes/barcodes, then immediately displays results with multiple options for the next operation.

*Support All QR & Barcode Formats*
Automatically scan, read, and decode all types of QR codes/barcodes, including Wi-Fi, contacts, URL, products, text, books, E-mail, location, calendar, etc. Also, batch scan is supported!

*Price Scanner*
You can use this QR code reader as price scanner to scan product barcodes in stores, check product sources, view details, and compare prices online. Use it to scan promo/coupon codes💰 for discounts is also a wise choice.

*QR Code Creator*
It is also a QR code generator, helps you to create your own QR codes for URL, Wi-Fi, phone number, contacts, text, and more...

*Privacy Safe*
Your privacy is 100% safe. QR code scanner app only requires camera permission, and it won't use this permission to access any personal information in your phone.

#WHY CHOOSE QR CODE SCANNER?#
✔Support all QR & barcode formats
✔Auto zoom
✔Batch scan supported
✔Support scan QR & barcodes from gallery
✔Scan history saved
✔Dark mode supported
✔Flashlight supported
✔Privacy safe
✔No internet connection required

How to Use
1. Point camera to the QR code/barcode
2. Auto recognize, scan and decode
3. Get result and relevant options

test_endpoint.title: Daily Quotes - Quotes App
test_endpoint.summary:
Let inspirational quotes motivate you and give you positive reminders every day! Get motivation with millions of users and enhance your well-being by daily affirmations.

QUOTES is full of motivational quotes. When you have bad days, it has the power to heal you. If you hope for an extra boost, it inspires you to fight for your goals and achieve your dreams. What’s more, we will help you build good habits, develop a positive mindset and become a better self by daily reminders. You can also share favorite quotes with friends to stay strong together.

💡 What You Can Enjoy From QUOTES:
● Stick to your goals with personalized quote plans after a few questions.
● Give you daily positive reminders when waking up. Keep yourself energetic and happy throughout the day.
● Use widgets to boost your confidence & motivation straight from your home screen.
● Mix different categories to adjust and create your own motivational plan.
● Within one tap, share favorite quotes with your loved ones or on social media platforms to spread motivation.
● Getting motivation can be simpler than ever. Find quotes you need at ease even if you are offline.

📖 Great Motivational Quotes Collections:
* Relieve Stress
* Positive Thinking
* Self Care & Self Love
* Heal after a Breakup
* Fight Depression
* Self Improvement
* Love your Family
* Boost Career & Study
* Do Exercise
* Healthy Body
* Women’s Strength
… and 50+ collections in total!

We’ve covered thousands of carefully curated quotes. They are customizable for you to mix to meet your every mood. They will help you to grow and reach a better you.

☀️ Why You Need QUOTES:
- Feel frustrated by a setback and wish for a motivation booster.
- Hope daily motivation helps you beat bad habits and improve productivity and confidence.
- Plan to make a fresh start but don’t know how to move forward.
- Often get distracted, waste your time, and feel unproductive.
- Can't stick to an exercise routine or want to become fit and healthy.

⭐️ Find Quotes, Find a Better You
Rome wasn’t built in a day. To improve yourself, you need consistent daily reminders. Using QUOTES, you will find quotes inspiring you the most and believe in your own power day by day.

⭐️ Get Quotes, Get Power to Grow
Everyone has personal struggles and stress. When life knocks you down, QUOTES is here to help you find motivation and hope to get through those tough times.

It is high time to embark on your journey to motivational quotes. QUOTES is your loyal friend who can encourage you and give you power all the time. With our company, you will have the power to transform yourself into a positive, happier and healthier person.

test_endpoint.title: Phone Tracker: Phone Locator
test_endpoint.summary:
Phone Tracker, as an accurate and reliable GPS location tracker, helps you find and track your family fast to keep them safe. With mutual consent and exclusive code/number sharing, you can geolocate family & friends at home, on the road, and on the go, easily and fast. Download Phone Tracker to have family's location at your fingertips!

What You Can Get:
📍 Real-time Location Tracking - Track your family's real-time location to keep them safe even in the background, especially your kids and older people.
⚡ Accurate & Fast Location Updates - Pinpoint your family's exact location accurately. Keep you informed with fast real-time location updates.
🗒 Unlimited Members & History - You can add as many family members to your network as possible and see their complete location history without any payment.
🔋 Detailed Battery Information - You will see detailed battery charge level & status and notice any abnormalities to avoid losing touch with older people & kids.

More Fantastic Features:
✓ Stay linked even in the background, 24/7 protect your family's safety
✓ Find your family in the crowd, no longer get lost on outings
✓ "Visible" function to hide your location in case you want some private space
✓ Battery friendly, minimize your battery usage

Different from other apps, you will not be charged when using Phone Tracker. As a way to make everyone enjoy the app at NO COST, we have to add ads in our app.

Disclaimer: Location services can drain your battery since they are supposed to be on all the time. We try our best to make your battery last longer and apply algorithms to minimize battery usage.

How to Use:
1. Install our app on your phone and your family's phone
2. Get your unique & exclusive code/number, copy and send it to your family

😊 Done! After they accept your request, start safe location sharing in a private network!

Please rest assured that your GPS location sharing is possible only when you both allow it. Your privacy and data security are always our top concerns. Our app only requests few permissions, mainly the location permission, protecting your privacy online.

test_endpoint.title: PDF Scanner - Document Scanner
test_endpoint.summary:
ACE Scanner is a free PDF scanner app!

This simple scanner uses your device camera to quickly scan documents.

You can use it to scan, import, and convert documents and images, and share as PDF/JPG with just one click!

WHY CHOOSE ACE Scanner:
1. Quickly Scan Any Documents to PDFs
With just one single tap, ACE Scanner can quickly scan and convert all kinds of documents - receipts, notes, documents, invoices, photos, business cards, certificates, whiteboards, etc. You can print out the scan results right away via Cloud Print.

2. Manage Your Files Simply
✔️️Create folders and subfolders to categorize files more clearly
✔️Select the type of file (Folders, Docs, etc.) you are looking for to save time finding your target
✔️Use batch editing to quickly modify your files
✔️Manage your files effectively with features such as copying, moving, renaming, and manual sorting

3. High Quality Scan Results
Documents processed by ACE Scanner are sharp, clear, and high-resolution, thanks to the precise edges detection, smart cropping, and auto-enhancement features. It also provides multiple filters - Docs, Image, Enhance, Black & White, etc. - to further optimize the scan results.

4. One-Click Sharing
You can easily share scanned files in PDF or JPEG formats with your friends via email, messaging apps, or post the documents on social media.

5. Practical Documents Editing
✔️Add/edit/delete any pages individually in the document
✔️Convenient document layout adjustment
✔️Multiple PDF page sizes (Letter, Legal, A4, etc.) to meet all needs

6. Add E-Signatures
Need to sign your signature on PDFs? ACE Scanner supports adding electronic signatures to scanned documents. Easily generate and send documents with your e-signature!

7. Custom Security Watermarks
You can quickly create custom anti-counterfeiting watermarks to protect your files. Adjust the text/size/transparency/color of the watermark as you prefer.

8. OCR Text Recognition
ACE Scanner adopts OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology to help you accurately recognize text on images or papers, and export text for later copying, editing, searching, and sharing.

9. Quick Search
Hard to find the target file among a bunch of files? Simply enter one keyword, the quick search feature will find the file you need among multiple folders. Besides, you can also find texts in images and notes in no time with the OCR search feature.

Now download ACE Scanner - a simple and FREE PDF scanner! Say goodbye to bulky file cabinets and enjoy a more productive life.

UPCOMING FEATURES:
👉Add Annotations
In the future versions, users can add annotations to the scan results with the advanced editing feature. You can tag and review the documents more effectively!

👉Lock Confidential Documents
Lock your confidential documents with passwords and share them securely. No one can open it without a password.

👉File Backup and Sync
ACE Scanner allows users to backup and sync files to Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Evernote, etc. You can view, edit, and manage your files by simply logging in to your account on your smartphone, tablet, computer or any devices.

You can use ACE Scanner to:
✔️Scan Business Card, Receipt, Invoice, and more for office use.
✔️Scan PPT, Note, Book, and more to improve learning efficiency.
✔️Scan ID Card, Passport, Driver License, and other important certificates.
✔️Scan more: Tax Roll, Memo, Map, Paint, Travel Brochure, Manuscript...

test_endpoint.title: Blood Pressure App
test_endpoint.summary:
The Blood Pressure App is your reliable, safe, and fast assistant to help you to track your BP trends, find BP info and provide good lifestyle tips to benefit your health.

Know extensive BP information and knowledge in one app! In addition to BP value ranges and tendencies, it has a lot of professional articles ready to answer any questions about BP knowledge.

We promise that you will find it fast and easy to pay close attention to your blood pressure and to detect small changes brought by your lifestyle improvements.

Using the Blood Pressure App, you can grasp your BP condition fully under different states (lying, sitting, before/after meal, etc.). There is no doubt that your health will be taken care of to yield twice the result with half the effort.

You can export your BP trends to maximize your medical appointment. Our app also introduces tips and methods for your health improvements in the long term.

What’s more, when you wish to know more about blood pressure, feel free to contact us and we are here by your side and ready to help.

test_endpoint.title: Flashlight: Flashlight Pro
test_endpoint.summary:
Flashlight Pro - the powerful torch light, lighting up your world whenever you want.

When you need light in dark, find flashlight & LED lights by FLASHLIGHT, turning your phone into a small & handy flashlight. Fear not! The brightest and fastest flashlight is with you!

Once you start FLASHLIGHT, the led light will be automatically turned on by default and provide bright light immediately. Even if you leave the app, the light still shines like the brightest burning torch.

Activate the extremely bright LED flashlight with just one tap. By sliding the regulator left and right, you can change the flashing mode from slow to super-fast flashing light in 8 levels to meet your needs. We also have an SOS mode to help you send Morse code in danger.

🔦Key Features:
- Long-lasting and easy-to-use flashlight
- Intuitive and user-friendly interface
- 9 light modes to change light as you like
- Compass & Map help you find the way easily
- Send SOS Morse code by flashing light in an emergency
- Energy-saving and having the flashlight on when exiting the app
- Morse code flashlight with regulatable transmission speed
- Clear sound effects of turning on/off and switching light modes in dark
- No internet needed

☀️Situations to Use Flashlight:
- Look for what you want in dark
- Find your way outdoors
- Read novels at night by flashlight
- Light up your room during a power outage
- Replace torchlight in outdoor camping & hiking
- Send SOS or any Morse code to get rescued in danger
- Walk your dogs after sunset in light
- Create a great mood for parties and live music events

FLASHLIGHT PRO is compatible with most mobile devices, including Sony, Samsung, LG, Lenovo, TCL, Xiaomi, Oppo, Vivo, HTC, Alcatel, ZTE, Motorola,... and way more!

Come and get the brightest, fastest, and simplest flashlight ever! You can see a bright and powerful LED light just like the light from real flashlight equipment. Enjoy and light your life with our app!

test_endpoint.title: Tarot
test_endpoint.summary:
Gain interpretations from Tarot Card Reading app. Pick 10 kinds of tarot spreads, including classic, love, and daily tarot, to anticipate the future of your money, work, and relationship.

🔮 Carefully Designed Tarot Spreads:
💖 Two Hearts 💖 - Will your love last forever? Get professional tarot interpretation and forecast for you and your partner. 
💡 Daily Insights - Get classic tarot suggestions of your day from this three-card spread.
🍀 4-Card Daily Draw - Pick 4 tarot cards to explore today’s fortune, career, love and get advice on your action.
🗓️ Daily Card - Draw one tarot card and look into what the next 24 hours holds for you.
✡️ Past, Present & Future - Gain insight into your life, make sense of the past, feel the present and figure out what to do next.
🤔 Yes or No - Ask the tarot a Yes or No question, it will give you a direct answer with divination interpretations.

🌿 Track your daily tarot readings
See a clear diary of wise messages you’ve received and look at your life in new ways.

Discover 22 Major Arcana tarot card meanings and enjoy vibrant images from the Classic Rider Waite Tarot Deck.

Tarot cards reading can help you clarify your inner confusion, make good decisions at present and create a marvelous future. Are you ready to master your life and be your own fortune-teller? Let the magic happen to you from now on!

test_endpoint.title: Blood Sugar - Diabetes App
test_endpoint.summary:
Blood Sugar App makes it easy and fast to record, monitor blood glucose, and manage your diabetes!

Our app can make a quick analysis of your blood glucose levels and help you understand the meaning of measurement values. With just one tap, you can convert your blood sugar units (mg/dL, mmol/L). Besides, you will be able to master your health timely by tracking the evolutionary trend of blood sugar.

As your one-stop blood health companion, we’ve got scientific knowledge and advice for you to prevent diabetes and keep healthy.

Key Features for You:
📝 Easy to log, track and monitor your blood glucose levels
🔍 Blood glucose readings analysis to tell if you are healthy
📉 Clear charts help you monitor blood glucose and also useful to detect abnormalities in glycohemoglobin
🏷 Customized tags addable to each record to distinguish every measurement state (before/after a meal, fasting, taking insulin, etc.)
📖 Useful blood glucose knowledge and health advice for managing diabetes
📤 Quick historical reports exporting to share directly with your doctor
☁️ Data backup securely even when changing device
🔄 Use or switch two different blood glucose level units (mg/dl or mmol/l)

Record Blood Sugar Easily
No paper and pen are required. Record your blood glucose readings anytime, anywhere.
You can add any tags you want to make notes of measurement states in detail (before/after a meal, drugs, mood, etc.), which helps you manage diabetes better.

Clear Graphs to Monitor Blood Sugar
With the help of clear graphs, you can look over your blood sugar history at a glance and review changes easily.
Observe abnormal trends quickly and take action in time to avoid hypers or hypos and improve your current health.

Rich Blood Sugar Knowledge for Health
The app offers you comprehensive health knowledge for blood sugar and expert advice to prevent or control diabetes (Type 1, Type 2, or gestational diabetes).
It is helpful for you to reduce your worries about diabetes treatment and develop a healthy lifestyle.

Safely Backup All Records
There is no worry about losing your data when switching to another device. Sync and restore all your records with one click.
By exporting all records, it will be convenient to provide your doctor with blood glucose data.

Download the app right now! You can find it easier to log, analyze and control your blood glucose. The app can be used as a blood sugar assistant to help you know your health condition and avoid or control diabetes better.
Let us lead you to reach the target blood sugar level step by step and bring you a healthy body and happiness.

Disclaimer:
Please note that this app does not measure your blood sugar, but only serves as an aid to help you keep track of blood sugar and control diabetes.

api_list.name: Get Suggestion
Sorting
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-play-api2.p.rapidapi.com/sorting"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-play-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://google-play-api2.p.rapidapi.com/sorting"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-play-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
